il.ac.telhai.coupons.model.CouponException

  • Packages that use CouponException 
    Package Description
    il.ac.telhai.coupons.controller
    Provides classes that act as the web site's controller.
    il.ac.telhai.coupons.model
    Provides classes for accessing the model (in our case, we access a MySQL relational database through Hibernate).
